oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis - Arkansas Bridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the bridge, taken from the small median.
Typed: "The Memphis-Arkansas Bridge -- Memphis, Tennessee -- The Memphis-Arkansas Bridge is a toll-free four-lane highway bridge with walkways for pedestrians." -- Handwritten: "on sale 1980"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis-Arkansas Bridge; bridges; transportation;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Plastichrome, Boston, Mass.; Collection processed by Angela Price; Digitized by S. Frierson
